name: Snake Eyes
description:
A tiny roguelike with giant snakes. Made in 48 or so hours for Mini Jam 83.  Hide behind boulders to evade enemies, but watch out! If they spot you they'll dash right through you. How deep can you get?

You may get stuck in walls on the initial spawn so for now please make use of the 'R' key to restart should you run into any such mishaps.

Controls (Gamepad Recommended):

  • Walk - Left/A, Right/D, Up/W, Down/S, Left Analog Stick
  • Roll - Space/Z/Button A (South)
  • Attack - Enter/X/Button X (West)
  • R - Restart
  • Quit - Escape
  • Mute Music - M
